select ch.COMMUNICATION_HISTORY_ID, ch.COMMUNICATION_TYPE, ch.CREATE_DATE, ch.RECORD_DATE, ch.SYSTEM_GENERATED, ch.UPDATE_DATE, ch.COMMENTS, ch.GIFT_ID, ch.COMMITMENT_ID,
from COMMUNICATION_HISTORY ch inner join PERSON p on ch.PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID where p.SITE_NAME= #siteName#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into COMMUNICATION_HISTORY (COMMUNICATION_TYPE, CREATE_DATE, RECORD_DATE, SYSTEM_GENERATED, UPDATE_DATE, COMMITMENT_ID, GIFT_ID, PERSON_ID, COMMENTS) values (#communicationHistoryType#, now(), #recordDate#, #systemGenerated#, now(), #commitmentId#, #giftId#, #person.id#, #comments#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update COMMUNICATION_HISTORY set COMMUNICATION_TYPE = #communicationHistoryType:VARCHAR#, RECORD_DATE = #recordDate#, SYSTEM_GENERATED = #systemGenerated#, UPDATE_DATE = now(), COMMITMENT_ID = #commitmentId#, GIFT_ID = #giftId#, PERSON_ID = #person.id#, COMMENTS = #comments# where COMMUNICATION_HISTORY_ID = #id#
